name: Notion Template: Wellness dashboard
description: This template includes a daily journal and a weekly review template. The journal is designed so you can easily enter some data about your days without having to write a lot. It's the perfect journal for those who struggle to journal. You can link your daily pages to your weekly reviews allowing you to sit down once a week and maybe do a more in depth review and reflection without needing a lot of time very single day. Included templates:- Daily journal template, with all properties set-up- Weekl
